data.taskDescription: Add search input to CommandsList that filters commands by name, invocation, or namespace. Reuse score-based fuzzy search pattern from StatusActionBadge. Show match count. Highlight matching text in results. Clear button to reset filter.
data.approach: Will add a search input to the header section of CommandsList, reusing the score-based fuzzy search pattern from StatusActionBadge (scoreCommand and filterCommands functions). The search will filter across name, invocation, and namespace fields. Will add match count badge and highlight matching text in results using a highlight utility.

summary: Added search input to CommandsList header with icon and clear button
Implemented score-based fuzzy search pattern (adapted from StatusActionBadge)
Added match count display showing X/Y commands when filtered
Added text highlighting for matches in invocation, name, and namespace
Updated CommandCard with searchQuery and highlightMatch props

quality.preExisting: Type errors in other files (not related to this task)

suggestedTasks.title: Add keyboard navigation to CommandsList search
suggestedTasks.description: Arrow keys to navigate results, Enter to select, Escape to clear. Follow pattern used in CommandPalette.

suggestedTasks.title: Add search to HooksEditor list
suggestedTasks.description: Similar search/filter pattern for hooks list, reuse highlightMatch function from CommandsList.
suggestedTasks.reason: Consistency - other config lists should also be searchable

patterns: Use scoreCommand() pattern for fuzzy search with weighted priorities
Use highlightMatch() for segment-based text highlighting
Pass searchQuery and highlightMatch as props for child highlighting
gotchas: filteredCommandGroups preserves namespace grouping while filtering
highlightMatch returns array of segments with isMatch boolean
